about_the_game: Anime Artist 2 comes with a 18+ free patch that allows you to see the full, uncensored beauty of the models featured in our "Private Pics" section!

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity, General Mature Content, Sexual content

This DLC also includes Adullt only content, consensual and explicit sexual activities.

detailed_description: Anime Artist 2 comes with a 18+ free patch that allows you to see the full, uncensored beauty of the models featured in our "Private Pics" section!
name: Anime Artist 2 - 18+ Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 - 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Display 1280x720
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Processor 1.7 Ghz - AMD Processor 1.7 Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Display 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
